title: A Stone in the bush
creator_credit: John Allen, Martyn Sanderson, Michael Glasheen and Zzoommovies
brief_description: An experimental film giving an impression of the making of the feature film “Ned Kelly” on location near Bungendore, New South Wales, in 1969. Shows the director and stars (including Mick Jagger) working in various locations, accompanied only by the music of the Rolling Stones.
creator_credit_for_label: John Allen, Martyn Sanderson, Michael Glasheen and Zzoommovies
